Rewatching Kill Bill vol. 1 for the first time in several years before listening to @WHMPodcast's WLM episode on it.

God damn, I'd almost forgotten just how good this is. First saw it either the year it came out or the year after, and it still holds up all these years later.

@Void__Puppy @DavvyChappy The vibe I got was if we are killing a child in this episode we want children not to watch. Quick, up the gore and put boobs on the screen to get an adult rating. I don't mind the gore, anime can be pretty brutal (Kill Bill Vol 1 was a homage to that) but e1 felt over the top.
